text: Michael Connor Gainey (born January 18, 1948) is an American actor whose distinctive mustache, 6'2" height, and intimidating appearance have landed him supporting roles as Southern or Southwestern thugs and criminals. He is known for playing a major role in the 1997 Con Air action movie. == Other websites == * Category:1948 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Mississippi Category:People from Jackson, Mississippi Category:Living people
title: M. C. Gainey
